text: Internal CS Subscription or Worktext Order Request Richland School district Issue with Subscription Self Service Portal Number 2905 Your Savvas Email Address What do you need help with Customer Service Who will resolve this issue Core Curriculum What can we assist with Subscription or Worktext Order What is the specific issue with the subscription/worktext order Issue with Subscription Self Service Portal Doc Control, Order, Invoice, or Purchase Order  Number PWKB201102387 Description, Reason, or Additional Information Richland USD is requested the release of the workbooks that they ordered in May 2020. Its August and this workbooks order is still not in my ordering system and school starts next week. Can we get these workbooks released. All workbook items where placed on the workbook reorder site for Savvas. Please do not send me a response and tell me to reach out to the AGM. This is a SAVVAS site where customers place workbook request.
